body: This might be a dumb question, but wouldn't the fit method in ASE/LSE overridden the fit method in base, and how would we implement an abstract method in base?
it is possible to have a fit in base and call it using `super().method()`. idea would be to use that to take care of some of the redundant parts
I'd be interested in this issue
